text: Hi guys - when creating new pages for a client in a sandbox account belonging to us (the agency) - to our clients account - does / can the content be ported with it? Or does all the content need to by moved manually?

I do not believe that you can move page content over, only templates and such. You could create pages via the API, but depending on the amount of pages, its probably not worth it. I have not yet experimented with whether saved sections in a theme copy over to other portals. but that could be one way to at least get some of the more complicated sections over.
Crossposting here as there is no contentstaging channel AFAIK.

HubSpot BUG: Disappearing Menus (simple and advanced)?
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Anyone else experiencing this issue?

I've now got three separate customers asking me about this.  Seems that a change to the menu, even as something as editing as a label can disappear the menu.

Support ticket numbers coming. I told each customer to reach out and submit a ticket.
Hey Kevin, this is already on our radar and we are looking into it.
I will update once I have more information
Ive run into this issue last week as well

Hi everyone,

I was wondering if you could associate a custom object to the HubSpot-defined products object ?
I need it for a client but so far the only choice that looks left to me is to create a products custom object on top of the existing products and quotes object.
